languages.text: "Карающие плети Его секут спины нечистых багряным пламенем. Ибо Неумирающий есть долг!"

traits.locale_text: "Карающие плети Его секут спины нечистых багряным пламенем. Ибо Неумирающий есть долг!"

languages.text: "Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"
languages.original_text: "Карающие плети Его секут спины нечистых багряным пламенем. Ибо Неумирающий есть долг!"

"Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"

languages.text: «¡Que Sus flagelos azoten las espaldas de los profanadores con las llamas carmesíes del castigo, pues el Inmortal es deber!».
languages.original_text: "Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que Sus flagelos azoten las espaldas de los profanadores con las llamas carmesíes del castigo, pues el Inmortal es deber!».

languages.text: 「不敬な者の背を、罰の深紅の炎で打たれよ。不死の者は義務です！」
languages.original_text: "Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"

traits.locale_text: 「不敬な者の背を、罰の深紅の炎で打たれよ。不死の者は義務です！」

languages.text: “愿祂的鞭子像惩罚的烈焰一样，抽在不敬之人的背上，因为不死之神便是责任本身！”
languages.original_text: "Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"

traits.locale_text: “愿祂的鞭子像惩罚的烈焰一样，抽在不敬之人的背上，因为不死之神便是责任本身！”

languages.text: "Mögen Seine Harpyien die Rücken der Gotteslästerer mit den roten Flammen der Strafe züchtigen. "Denn der Todlose ist die Pflicht!"
languages.original_text: "Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"

traits.locale_text: "Mögen Seine Harpyien die Rücken der Gotteslästerer mit den roten Flammen der Strafe züchtigen. "Denn der Todlose ist die Pflicht!"

languages.text: « Que Ses fléaux lacèrent le dos des profanateurs à la flamme écarlate du châtiment. Car l'Immortel est le devoir incarné ! »
languages.original_text: "Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"

traits.locale_text: « Que Ses fléaux lacèrent le dos des profanateurs à la flamme écarlate du châtiment. Car l'Immortel est le devoir incarné ! »

languages.text: "O'nun kırbaçları, cezasının kızıl alevleriyle kâfirlerin sırtlarını alazlasın. Çünkü Ölmeyen, vazife demektir!"
languages.original_text: "Let His scourges strike the backs of profaners with the crimson flames of punishment. For the Undying One is duty!"
